articles.author: Joe Barnes, Brussels Correspondent
articles.title: EU funded Wuhan lab: European Commission faces probe over thousands of euros sent to China - Daily Express
articles.description: THE European Union has helped fund the Chinese research laboratory that could have triggered the global pandemic with a coronavirus leak.

articles.author: James Robson
articles.title: Chelsea FC have Romelu Lukaku and Erling Haaland transfer plan to fend off Harry Kane-chasing Man City - Evening Standard
articles.description: Chelsea are champions of Europe — now Roman Abramovich needs to go again.
articles.content:
Manchester City certainly will. If their Abu Dhabi ownership has proved anything, it is that there is no end game, no summit to be reached before they quietly go away.
Coming so tantalisingly close … [+5540 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Kemble, George Smith, Tom Clark
articles.title: Chelsea news and transfers live: Five-man shortlist, £80m blow, £25m deal close to being sorted - Football.London
articles.description: Join us for all the latest Chelsea transfer news as the Blues look to sign a striker to take their European success into next season's Premier League campaign
articles.content:
Chelsea are still on cloud nine after their Champions League victory, but the work for next season has already begun.
